tool_description: Unlock the power of originality with our AI & Plagiarism Checker API. Seamlessly integrate our cutting-edge technology into your applications to scan and verify content for authenticity, ensuring academic integrity and content uniqueness with ease.
name: AI & Plagiarism Checker
title: AI & Plagiarism Checker

api_list.name: POST Data and Get response
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-plagiarism-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/detect/ai_content"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-plagiarism-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
